channel.title: ChaoticX Release
channel.description:
[CENTER]
[size=18pt]Alot of things happened to making this server, some fags like "Nasz", joined the development team but were being "fags" so therefore hindered development calling my coding "shit". So far i have come this far, so expect more.[/size]
The newest JDK (1.7.0) doesn't work with the included xStream library, you need to update the server's XStream library, OR USE A DIFFERENT VERSION OF JAVA, latest version can be found here:https://nexus.codehaus.org/content/repositories/releases/com/thoughtworks/xstream/xstream/1.4.1/xstream-1.4.1.jar
For the noobs:
[img]http://screensnapr.com/e/S5RYMt.png[/img] Please be patient as I upload the source - 8% now, my upload sucks, so browse through the features while you wait.
Why i'm releasing this? Because Softnyx and I have finally decided, due to dementhium's exceeding bugs, that it is not a stable source to work upon. And plus, to be honest, not many people enjoy playing dementhium.
What will happen? I shall continue to work on dementhium while i can (when i have time), and probably make more updates and possibly release also
OK, so i have also gotten softnyx's permission in releasing this so :)
Im also releasing so people can make a decent start on 614 economy, my economy did not work out, so i hope it is helpful to you all
Neways let's head to features
[COLOR="Cyan"]Godwars Nex Farming - 75% Clanwars - SafePk Working PVP drops with protect item 100% Corporeal Beast Pickup / Remove globalGroundItem Fixed (when you try to pickup or remove at a height above 0) Firemaking Woodcutting - Dementhium Team Mining Core - Softnyx Shitty PKpoint system with shops, look through source its somewhere Tormented Demons Training / Leveling Up Object spawning / removing Offer - X in trade works 100% Herblore - 100% Timer system - Softnyx Special attack fix Shitty attempt at pathfinding fix. Item on Object packet Barrows Abyssal Demons Backup system / Crash restarter - 100% credits to creator of CBU in RS2Server section Music? A start on agility Administrator commands Improved yell command
Well thats all i can remember at the moment, oh yeah, the files has a eclipse java bytecode optimizer soot, u may wanna use that too. [/COLOR]
[IMG]http://screensnapr.com/e/DGtsK5.png[/img]
[IMG]http://screensnapr.com/e/HPjtM5.png[/img]
[IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/1569963/100_Percent_Herb_cleaning.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/1569975/Unf_pot_creation.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i980.photobucket.com/albums/ae286/ansaf/Potcreation2.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/1582345/Harvesting.gif[/img]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vq8cUWfCcm8&feature=channel_video_title]Torms - YouTube[/url]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9jG-2XUdC6k&feature=relmfu]Corporeal beast on ChaoticX 634 - YouTube[/url]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W8nzj0nYxzk&feature=relmfu]Nex on ChaoticX 614 - YouTube[/url]
I would like to thank the dementhium team for making this happen :pirate:
[COLOR="Lime"]Download: [url=http://www.upload.ee/files/1609789/614_on_634_source.zip.html]http://www.upload.ee/files/1609789/614_on_634_source.zip.html[/url] [/COLOR] [/CENTER]
